description: As a Software Engineer at TechCorp, I was responsible for designing and implementing scalable web applications using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. I worked closely with UX designers and backend teams to develop efficient, user-friendly features. My role also included code reviews, writing unit tests, and deploying applications using CI/CD pipelines.

At DevSolutions, I worked as a Backend Developer focusing on creating and maintaining RESTful APIs using Express.js and PostgreSQL. I optimized query performance and ensured security best practices. I also collaborated with frontend developers to define API contracts, implemented authentication mechanisms, and managed data migrations and versioning for various services.

During my internship at Startup Inc., I gained hands-on experience in web development and software QA. I contributed to frontend development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and participated in daily stand-ups with the agile team. I also assisted in writing test cases, logging bugs, and improving UI accessibility across platforms.
